heroContent: Take your ride from rust to radiance

bodyContent.text: Experience a luxury hot water shampoo of your machine, we'll degrease the oily bits followed by a touch-less warm air dry that ensures every hard-to-reach area is free of water and road grime. Afterward, we apply a premium wax polish to enhance and protect the painted surfaces, giving your bike a lasting shine

• 2 hour detailing package - minimum $175.00 (excl. GST)
  • Pickup and Delivery - Location dependent, call us for pricing

faqs.a: MC3 is located in Upper Hutt, New Zealand. Follow our website and social channels for opening hours and events, or simply to stay in touch.

faqs.q: Can you pick up and deliver my motorcycle?
faqs.a: Yes. Additional fees will apply and bookings are essential. We trailer bikes to MC3 and we will not ride your motorcycle. Give us a call or pop in with your ride for a free consultation.
Yes, bookings are essential. Give us a call or pop in with your ride for a free consultation.

faqs.q: How long will it take to detail my motorcycle?
faqs.a: We spend 2 hours on every motorcycle we clean. With optional same-day pickup and return for locals (additional fees apply).

faqs.q: My bike has a lot of chrome, is this included in the 2 hour detailing package?
faqs.a: Chrome requires special attention, therefore we offer custom packages for chromewear. Our 2 hour detailing package does not cater for this.
